label: A6B2C_tP18_128_eh_d_a-001
title: Phase II K$_{2}$SnCl$_{6}$ Structure
comments:
K$_{2}$SnCl$_{6}$ is found in three forms, depending on the temperature: \begin{itemize} \item Below 255K it is in the \href{current_web_home_dir/A6B2C_mP18_14_3e_e_a-001}{monoclinic Phase I structure}. \item In the range 255-261K it is in the \href{current_web_home_dir/A6B2C_tP18_128_eh_d_a-001}{tetragonal Phase II structure} (this structure). \item Above 261K it transforms to Phase III, which has the \href{current_web_home_dir/A6B2C_cF36_225_e_c_a-001}{K$_{2}$PtCl$_{6}$ ($J1_{1}$) structure}. \end{itemize} ~ \vspace{-.25in} 
 Data for Phase II was taken at 265K.
